item.title: US says Hamas is planning 'imminent' attack on Gaza civilians
item.description: The US state department says the move would be a violation of the ceasefire deal, but did not give further details.

item.title: Spanish town bans black cat adoptions during Halloween
item.description: In an effort to ward off potentially sinister rituals, the Catalonian town of Terrassa hopes to keep its black cats safe during the occult-themed holi...

item.title: Grand Theft Auto made him a legend. His latest game was a disaster
item.description: Lesley Benzies was one of the architects behind one of the most successful video games in history.

item.title: Why I fell in love with a book called I Want to Die but I Want to Eat Tteokbokki
item.description: In reflecting on a gentle melancholy many can relate to, this book teaches us to appreciate the small joys in life.

item.title: Mystery deepens after missing schoolgirl found dead in pop star D4vd's Tesla
item.description: Questions around the up-and-coming TikTok star's connection to a teenage girl's death have eclipsed his career's rise.
